name: Oricorio
description: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.

abilities.name: Dancer
abilities.effect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
abilities.description: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
